title: Serbia Arrests 8 In Connection With 1995 Srebrenica Massacre
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block interviews the BBC's Guy De Launey about the arrests of eight men accused of taking part in the Srebrenica massacre.
contentencoded:
NPR's Melissa Block interviews the BBC's Guy De Launey about the arrests of eight men accused of taking part in the Srebrenica massacre. Some 8,000 Bosnian Muslim men were killed there by Serbian forces in 1995.
